  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    getAndUploadHash​(File worldFile, long runId)
    Packs the current world folder and the latest.log file into a ZIP file named "verification-[worldFileName].zip" in the verificationFolder using IOUtils.packZipFile(String, String, String) It then converts the ZIP-File into a Hash using IOUtils.zipToHash(File) and sends it to the Verification-Server using uploadHashToken(long, String) This method should be called asynchronously via uploadHash( long) if possible.
    static void
    log​(org.apache.logging.log4j.Level level, String message)

    • needsUpload

      public static boolean needsUpload()

    • onInitializeClient

      public void onInitializeClient()
      Adds an event to the onComplete listener of SpeedRunIGT that fires at run completion. It will save the world and upload its Hash after a delay of one second.
      Specified by:
      onInitializeClient in interface net.fabricmc.api.ClientModInitializer
      See Also:
      )

    • log

      public static void log​(org.apache.logging.log4j.Level level, String message)

    • register

      public static void register​(com.mojang.brigadier.CommandDispatcher<net.minecraft.server.command.ServerCommandSource> dispatcher)
      Registers the command serversiderng_uploadRun that will save the world and upload it's hash via the getAndUploadHash(File,long) method.
      Parameters:
      dispatcher - the CommandDispatcher to add the command to
      See Also:
      )

    • getAndUploadHash

      public static void getAndUploadHash​(File worldFile, long runId)
      Packs the current world folder and the latest.log file into a ZIP file named "verification-[worldFileName].zip" in the verificationFolder using IOUtils.packZipFile(String, String, String) It then converts the ZIP-File into a Hash using IOUtils.zipToHash(File) and sends it to the Verification-Server using uploadHashToken(long, String) This method should be called asynchronously via uploadHash( long) if possible.
      Parameters:
      worldFile - the file of the world to zip and upload the hash of
      See Also:
      IOUtils.zipToHash(File), IOUtils.packZipFile(String, String, String), )

    • uploadHash

      public static void uploadHash​(long runId)
